sn38.1:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto magadhesu viharati nalakagamake.
sn38.1:1.2: Atha kho jambukhadako paribbajako yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn38.1:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho jambukhadako paribbajako ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn38.1:2.5: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti?
sn38.1:2.6: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
sn38.1:2.7: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti?
sn38.1:2.8: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.1:2.9: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi.
sn38.1:2.10: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
sn38.1:2.11: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya.
